channel.title: Staff Help
channel.description:
I'm not exactly sure if i'm in the right section but if i am please just move it.
I have made servers before and i am starting a new one. I need help with some basic coding and stuff. I also need in-game and website staff.
The server is URGS or UnRealGodScape.
It is currently running on hamachi for beta testing and suck because i can not port forward for hosting on no-ip.
If you guys are interested in helping out with staff positions or coding/hosting. Please reply to this post or Email me at mhbstudio@hotmail.com
I would put the server website but im not sure if it is against rules.
